it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.network.rmi

Class ClientRMIInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.network.rmi.ClientRMIInterface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkInterface, ClientInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ClientRMIInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface, NetworkInterface
    This class connects the client and the server using RMI. Implementing a direct ClientInterfaceImpl class would have made the close() method a little difficult so I merged the clientImplementation with the network interface
    Author:
    Jimmy
